## TinySynq.getById() method

Retrieves a single record by it's ID.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getById<T>(params: TableNameRowParams): T | any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | TableNameRowParams | Object containing table/row parameters. |

**Returns:**

T \| any


## Remarks

The column used to identify the record is according to the [SyncableTable](./tinysynq-node.syncabletable.md) that was provided in [TinySynqOptionsBase.tables](./tinysynq-node.tinysynqoptionsbase.tables.md) at instantiation.
